items.title: Understanding Exchange Rates
items.description: Learn how buy and sell rates differ and why spreads exist in currency markets.

items.title: Daily Exchange History
items.description: Track historical NGN/XOF rates to identify patterns and plan transfers wisely.

items.title: Cross-Border Compliance
items.description: Know the regulations for moving money between Nigeria and Benin securely.

items.title: Beneficiary Management
items.description: Add, update, and remove beneficiaries to streamline your transfers.

items.title: Financial Literacy Tip #1
items.description: Always compare exchange rates before sending money to maximize value.

items.title: Financial Literacy Tip #2
items.description: Keep records of all transfers for accountability and dispute resolution.

items.title: Fraud Prevention
items.description: Verify recipient details carefully to avoid scams and misdirected funds.

items.title: Exchange Rate Alerts
items.description: Set alerts to be notified when NGN/XOF rates hit your target.

items.title: Account Linking
items.description: Securely link your Nigerian bank account for faster transfers.

items.title: Compliance Checklist
items.description: Ensure your transactions meet anti-money laundering and KYC requirements.

items.title: Exchange History Chart
items.description: Visualize NGN/XOF trends over the past 30 days.

items.title: Financial Literacy Tip #3
items.description: Diversify your savings between Naira and CFA to reduce risk.

items.title: Beneficiary Verification
items.description: Use two-factor authentication when adding new beneficiaries.

items.title: Secure Transfers
items.description: All transfers are encrypted end-to-end for maximum security.

items.title: Financial Literacy Tip #4
items.description: Understand transaction fees and how they affect your net transfer amount.

items.title: Exchange History Snapshot
items.description: Review weekly summaries of NGN/XOF fluctuations.
